content:
I apologize, but I think there was a mistake. I was supposed to respond as a user, not as an assistant. Here's my revised response:

I'm looking to incorporate interval training into my running routine to challenge myself more. Can you give me some tips on how to do it effectively and safely? I've been doing mostly steady-state runs, but I want to mix things up. By the way, I've done a total of 12 runs in my new Asics Gel-Kayano 28 shoes so far, covering a distance of approximately 60 miles.
